title: Meta unleashes Llama API running 18x faster than OpenAI: Cerebras partnership delivers 2,600 tokens per second
summary: Meta partners with Cerebras to launch its new Llama API, offering developers AI inference speeds up to 18 times faster than traditional GPU solutions, challenging OpenAI and Google in the fast-growing AI services market.Read More

filter_verdict.reasoning_summary: Significant development in AI inference speeds with major player Meta challenging OpenAI and Google, but not urgent enough to be Breaking.

seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Meta's Llama API Achieves Breakthrough Speed with Cerebras  

Meta has partnered with Cerebras to launch its new **Llama API speed**, offering developers AI inference performance up to 18 times faster than traditional GPU solutions. The collaboration enables processing speeds of 2,600 tokens per second, positioning Meta as a strong competitor to OpenAI and Google in the AI services market.  

### A Leap in AI Performance  
The Cerebras-powered Llama API outperforms existing GPU-based solutions, providing a significant boost for real-time AI applications. This advancement could reshape the landscape of AI-driven services, offering faster and more efficient processing for developers.
